DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server v9; © 2004 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
SET DATEFORMAT 'YMD'
DECLARE @Periodo INT SET @Periodo = (select MAX(Id_PERIODO) from AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) DECLARE @Fecha_Periodo INT SET @Fecha_Periodo = CAST(CAST(@Periodo AS CHAR(6)) + '01' as INT)
-- Actualiza Periodo y Cantidad de Alertas. UPDATE AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS SET id_periodo = @Periodo, Cant_Alertas = 1
-- Actualiza Fecha Cierre. UPDATE AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS SET fecha_cierre = '1900-01-01' WHERE fecha_cierre = 0
DELETE FROM AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS_1 DELETE FROM AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS_2 DELETE FROM AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS_3
INSERT INTO AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS_1 SELECT * FROM AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS WHERE Fecha_Cierre = '1900-01-01' OR Fecha_Cierre > @Fecha_Periodo
INSERT INTO AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS_2 Select afiliado, MIN(fecha_Apertura) as Fecha_Min_Apertura FROM AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS_1 GROUP BY Afiliado
DELETE FROM AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS_1 FROM AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS_1 A1 INNER JOIN AUX_H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS_2 A2 ON A1.afiliado = A2.afiliado and A1.Fecha_Apertura <> A2.Fecha_Min_Apertura
-- Borro registros duplicados en aux_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados
INSERT INTO AUX_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_3 SELECT afiliado, Id_Tipo_Alerta, fecha_cierre, fecha_apertura, id_periodo, observaciones1, observaciones2, observaciones3, id_motivo_alerta, Cant_Alertas FROM aux_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_1 A WHERE NOT EXISTS (select afiliado, id_periodo FROM aux_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_1 AUX WHERE A.afiliado = AUX.afiliado AND A.id_periodo = AUX.id_periodo Group By afiliado, id_periodo HAVING coUNT(*) > 1)
INSERT INTO AUX_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_3 Select afiliado, MAX('A') as Tipo_Alerta, MAX('1900-01-01') as Fecha_Cierre, MAX('1900-01-01') as Fecha_Apertura, id_periodo, MAX('') as observaciones1, MAX('') as observaciones2, MAX('') as observaciones3, MAX('01') as Id_Motivo_Alerta, MAX(1) as Cant_Alertas FROM aux_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_1 A WHERE EXISTS (select afiliado, id_periodo FROM aux_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_1 AUX WHERE A.afiliado = AUX.afiliado AND A.id_periodo = AUX.id_periodo Group By afiliado, id_periodo HAVING coUNT(*) > 1) GROUP BY A.afiliado, A.id_periodo
UPDATE AUX_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_3 SET Id_Tipo_Alerta = A1.Id_Tipo_Alerta, Fecha_Cierre = A1.Fecha_Cierre, Fecha_Apertura = A1.Fecha_Apertura, observaciones1 = A1.observaciones1, observaciones2 = A1.observaciones2, observaciones3 = A1.observaciones3, id_motivo_alerta = A1.id_motivo_alerta, Cant_Alertas = A1.Cant_Alertas FROM AUX_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_3 A INNER JOIN aux_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_1 A1 ON A.afiliado = A1.afiliado AND A.id_periodo = A1.id_periodo WHERE EXISTS (select afiliado, id_periodo FROM aux_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_1 AUX WHERE A.afiliado = AUX.afiliado AND A.id_periodo = AUX.id_periodo Group By afiliado, id_periodo HAVING coUNT(*) > 1)

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server v9; © 2004 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualiza H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS. */
INSERT INTO H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS (afiliado, Id_Tipo_Alerta, fecha_cierre_alerta, fecha_apertura_alerta, id_periodo, Observaciones, id_motivo_alerta, Cant_Alertas) SELECT A1.afiliado, A1.Id_Tipo_Alerta, A1.fecha_cierre, A1.fecha_apertura, A1.id_periodo, (A1.observaciones1+ A1.observaciones2+ A1.observaciones3) as Observaciones, A1.id_motivo_alerta, A1.Cant_Alertas FROM aux_h_llaves_alertas_afiliados_3 A1

component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destinaton. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server v9; © 2004 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
SET DATEFORMAT 'YMD'
/* Borra H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS si ya existe. */ DELETE FROM H_LLAVES_ALERTAS_AFILIADOS WHERE ID_PERIODO IN ( SELECT ID_PERIODO FROM AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA)
